name: Heavy(artillery)Sleeper
description:
(controls below description)

in this game I have created for the Brackys 2022.2 game jam you play as a "wizard of sleep" fighting off sleep paralysis demons with your magic pillow (press e to fire z's)

I used the theme your not alone in the sense that your not alone in this dark area and you must fight to survive

Controls 

wasd to move

esc to pause

e to shoot
